comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Actually the tune I brought home was _Gonna' Take a Semi-mental Journey,_ which is, of course the state song of Kentucky. I kid, though; Louisville is a charming city with thoroughly modern features like rest rooms and sidewalks. I went for a nice walk along the Ohio River on Thursday afternoon, and reflected as I watched the effluent from the storm sewers arc lazily into the churning main, that there's a lot to be said about the _unter_ casual Southern approach to things like sanitation and grooming. I fit right in down there. Can't wait to bust a ride Monday! DU
